markdown:
<title level="1" right="Trait">[Teleportation](/Traits.aspx?ID=156)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 637 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

Teleportation effects allow you to instantaneously move from one point in space to another. Teleportation does not usually trigger reactions based on movement.
name: Teleportation
